description:
[h1]Introducing... the [b]Manned Turret![/b][/h1]

This player controlled turret is capable of many things:
[list]
[*]Taking down bots with potatoes/AA rounds
[*]Watering soil plots
[*]Lighting up an area
[*]Rapidly disassembling anything using the Explosive rounds
[/list]

Be careful though, it's not invincible!

[h1]And all of this is available in survival, thanks to [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2816900681]Questionable Mark's Modded Craftbot Recipes[/url]![/h1]

[h1]Credits[/h1]
[list]
    [*][b]Vajdani[/b] - Scripting
    [*][b]Illumina[/b] - Models, textures, thumbnail
[/list]

Have fun!
name: Manned Turret
